document.topic_text: Biker Takes Down Purse Thief Jukin Media 25 April 2016 This biker was trekking through the Wrocław Market in Poland when a woman popped out screaming for help and exclaiming that her purse was stolen. Thinking on his feet, the biker then made a swift u-turn and pursued the thieves who were running away. When he caught up to them, he tried to grab the bag and subsequently knocked the teenage purse thieves to the sidewalk. Luckily, there were more good samaritans around to help hold the thieves down before police arrived a few minutes later.
